page.title: 08LAW AND ORDER
page.content: {Police.}-2 policemen at Kingsand. Torpoint Police Station.16 men,1 CID 3 sergeants,4 vehicles.16 hr service. 999 calls go to Launceston Centre. Highway cover is from Bodmin. {Fire Service.}-Based at Torpoint, equipment 1 Landrover,1 Water Ladder. Extra backup from Saltash and Plymouth All 999 calls go to Truro, call out at Torpoint by radio alerters. {Ambulance Service.}-Based at Torpoint, 3 vehicles,duties from 0800 to 1800 hrs.Backup from Looe or Liskeard stations,then Ambulances stand by at Terule Foot. {Coastguard}Mostly voluntary help,only 1 permanent staff covering a large area. Auxillary part time watch -Radio,Visual,Cliff Rescue. {Customs.}Watch any visiting yachts in Creek,River and Whitsand Cliffs.
